posts.post_content:
Doom\_Lich: Design-wise, you're spot-on. Creative-wise, though, Ravnica appears to be a setting just a little more friendly to produce cards like these that somehow stand out anyway, as opposed to being forgotten in the rest of the Limited pile. See the Top Comment?  
  
I, personally, just for fun, wish to cast "[Overrun](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Overrun)" with one of these out. Just because 'meh, I want to have a variety of creatures out when I Overrun, and he looks cool :) "

posts.post_content:
Flavorful ability for a mount: It taps to attack, but its rider doesn't.  
I wonder if this evolved from an [Oathsworn Giant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Oathsworn Giant) reprint.  
Close relative to [Burrenton Shield-Bearers](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Burrenton Shield-Bearers).   
I love white's variety of simplified banding effects.
